headline: Science Weekly podcast: Back soon
text: As Science Weekly takes a short and (thoroughly un-)deserved summer break, now is the perfect time to take a stroll down memory lane and browse our archive. More small print  Subscribe for free via iTunes to ensure every episode gets delivered. (Here is the non-iTunes URL feed). Follow the podcast on our Science Weekly Twitter feed and receive updates on all breaking science news stories from Guardian Science. Email scienceweeklypodcast@gmail.com. Guardian Science is now on Facebook. You can also join our Science Weekly Facebook group.
